extendedInfo.description: Phonics Trace & Learn is two apps in one, Phonics Cards and the Trace & Learn game.  In the Phonics Cards game, preschoolers befriend 26 fun and culturally diverse characters from the world of Scholarville, and together they embark on an adventure in learning the fundamentals of alphabet letter sounds, and upper and lowercase letters. Characters like Addy the Acrobat and Bob the Baker introduce their letter.  There are 52 phonics cards, an uppercase and lowercase card for each letter of the alphabet.  The Trace & Learn game is designed to teach proper upper and lowercase letter formation, develop fine motor skills and build preliminary handwriting skills. In the game, a child is challenged to form a letter by dragging the green star to the red star.  The game will not permit a letter to be formed the wrong way. Phonics Trace & Learn plus two other apps, Phonics Matching & Memory and Phonics Guessing Game, were taken from an iPhone app, Phonics Fun & Games, that received 4.5 stars and an "Editors Choice" rating from BestAppsforKids.com and a "Top Pick" rating from FunEducationalApps.com

reviews.title: Phonics trace and learn
reviews.comment: Would be great if u could do more than 2 letters b4 u have to pay. I would happily pay for this app but it just wants my credit card details without telling me how much!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lousy.
reviews.comment: If you were gonna deprive kids of part of the alphabet why choose over half?! 3 letters is lame, I mean really?? 13 Peters would have at least been interesting. 3 isn\'t even enough to judge the app by. Greedy sons of bitches.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Force closes and the tracing doesn\'t work! That\'s what I downloaded it for!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: My four year old brother played on this app for a good five minutes . I came to check and a message popped up saying it has forced closed. Also my brother traced the letters correctly only to say it was wrong. This has happened four times and I am seriously suggesting to delete it. I am not sure if this happens on other phones but this is a Samsung Galaxy Note.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: The app is not accurate when tracing. Needs more work or just done the right way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: stupid
reviews.comment: its not free after the letter c
reviews.author: Josie Dow

reviews.title: Only 3 letters!
reviews.comment: I like the way this helps a child form the letters, it makes it very easy and it reinforces the letter sound...but it only includes A B and C to trace. I can\'t figure out how to buy the full app. Uninstalled.

reviews.comment: Tracing doesn\'t work because the graphics don\'t fit on the screen.  Its also quite unstable constantly closing.
